attributes.action: allow ALL offenders & suspects, regardless of age, to be named at all stages of a case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Regardless of age, everyone has to follow the law of the land. Why should someone who is 16 be treated differently to someone who is 18? By the time you are at least 7 you know not to steal, murder or abuse. "Naming & Shaming" may deter a "minor" from committing a crime knowing that, for the rest of their life, they will be known.
